title: Use only the uploaded EYEGIC logo file across the app

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded logo image file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" to the frontend as a static asset and use this exact image as the only logo image used anywhere in the app.

quotes: please use the file for logo attached with this message. please dont use any other logo. USE THE LOGO IN THIS FILE ONLY

acceptanceCriteria: The file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" is included in the frontend static assets (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/generated/) and is loadable by the UI.
No other logo image files are added or referenced anywhere in the repository or UI.

requirements.text: Implement a reusable BrandLogo component that renders the uploaded logo image, and replace the text-based brand rendering in the site header and footer with the BrandLogo component.

quotes: USE THE LOGO IN THIS FILE ONLY

acceptanceCriteria: SiteHeader displays the uploaded logo image (not a text-only brand name) for both desktop header and the mobile sheet header area.
SiteFooter displays the uploaded logo image (not a text-only brand name).
BrandLogo uses only the uploaded file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" as its image source and does not fetch logos from the backend or from any other asset.

requirements.text: Remove/avoid any remaining logo-related logic or references that would cause another logo to appear (including generated placeholder logos, previously bundled logo assets, or logo-management UI/hooks/utilities), while keeping existing settings routes for logo management disabled/absent.

quotes: please dont use any other logo

acceptanceCriteria: A search through the frontend codebase shows no references to any other logo asset filenames/paths besides "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png".
The app does not expose any logo upload/fetch/settings UI, and no backend calls exist in the frontend that attempt to retrieve or set a site logo.

constraints: Use only the user-uploaded image file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" for any logo rendering.
Do not introduce or reference any additional logo assets (including replacements, placeholders, or alternate logo variants).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding logo upload/change functionality in settings.
Storing or serving the logo from the backend canister.
Creating additional derived logo files such as favicons or alternate-sized logo variants.

required: EYEGIC logo image (EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.dim_1536x1024.png)
